sentences.en: A NEW SPECIES OF GENUS CONTRACAECUM ( ORINTOCAECUM ) FROM EUROPEAN WHITE PELICAN ( ASCARIDATA: ANISAKIDAE )
sentences.cn: 寄生于鹈鹕的对盲囊线虫一新种 ( 蛔亚目: 异尖科 )

sentences.en: An Anhinga — a pelican relative — stretches its wings to dry its feathers.
sentences.cn: 一只美洲蛇鸟——塘鹅的一种——张开了它的翅膀晾干羽毛.

sentences.en: Blum flipped past an evocative sandstone carving of a child and a pelican, then admired a griffin plaque.
sentences.cn: 勃鲁姆的视线飘过一块眼熟的雕着小孩和鹈鹕的砂岩，落在了一方狮鹫饰板上。

sentences.en: Caption: Feather pillow: A rose pelican rests its head at the zoo in Wuppertal, Germany.
sentences.cn: 描述: 羽毛枕头: 在德国伍珀塔尔动物园,一只玫瑰鹈鹕把头靠在身上休息.

sentences.en: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.
sentences.cn: 我像旷野的鹈鹕,又像废墟里的猫头鹰.

sentences.en: Pelican - Devoted and self - sacrificing charity.
sentences.cn: 鹈鹕 - 奉献与 自我牺牲 的慈善精神.

sentences.en: Rescue workers removed the fishing line, and the pelican is expected to fully recover.
sentences.cn: 营救人员解开了钓鱼线.这只塘鹅不久就能痊愈.

sentences.en: That's not a duck, it's a pelican!
sentences.cn: 那不是一只鸭子, 那是一只鹈鹕!

sentences.en: The pelican also uses its pouch as a dish to hold food for its babies.
sentences.cn: 鹈鹕还把这个空腔用作盘子,存放鱼给幼鹈鹕吃.

sentences.en: The Pelican Feeding Officers present an educational talk while feeding the pelicans.
sentences.cn: 那个正在喂鹈鹕的工作人员会边喂鹈鹕边给它上一节教育课.

sentences.en: The pelican has a very useful beak.
sentences.cn: 鹈鹕有一张非常有用的嘴.

sentences.en: There is a further mirroring of the White Swan and Pelican stages.
sentences.cn: 更进一步的真实反映情况在白天鹅和鹈鹕台阶上.

sentences.en: This funny pouch helps the pelican to trap fish.
sentences.cn: 这个有趣的空腔能帮助鹈鹕捕捉鱼.

sentences.en: When they get a tern or pelican to drop a fish, they plunge down and grab it off the surface of the water, which may have been how this bird got oiled.
sentences.cn: 当军舰鸟发现一只燕鸥或者鹈鹕准备冲入水中捕鱼时就猛冲下去，在捕鱼的鸟离开海面时抓住它们，这可能就是这种鸟为何解决到石油的原因。

trans.tran_en: a large water bird that catches fish for food and stores them in a deep bag of skin under its beak
